rationale: The note mentions the patient's report of improvement in nausea with sertraline but does not include the patient's concern about the duration of this side effect.
The note does not mention the clinician's reassurance about the commonality and expected duration of nausea or any plan to monitor and adjust treatment.
The note does not include any feedback from the patient on the manageability of nausea or its impact on daily activities.
The note documents the patient's engagement in therapy and lifestyle changes, including exercise and meditation.
The note does not mention any discussion or plan regarding follow-up on the patient's progress with therapy and lifestyle changes.
The note does not mention any offer from the clinician to discuss ways to manage the patient's routine if they feel overwhelmed.
